question: Which Airport has ranked No. 1 in the Airports Council International's (ACI) service quality survey.
option3: Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose International Airport
explanation: Hyderabad's Rajiv Gandhi International Airport (RGIA) has ranked No. 1 in the Airports Council International's (ACI) service quality survey in the category of 5 to 15 million passengers per annum. It was opened in year 2008 and is operated by GMR Hyderabad International Airport Ltd. (GHIAL). A trophy for this accomplishment for the year 2016 was handed over to GHIAL CEO, S G K Kishore during the 27th ACI Africa/world annual general assembly at Port Louis in Mauritius on October 18, 2017.
